creator: lassi.vaatamoinen@dnainternet.net
text:
Not possible to get cgi-scripts working outside ScriptAlias directory in Suse 10.1
(Not possible to change the scriptalias dir also to make it work).

For example cgi-script execution in /home/*/public_html/cgi-bin/ not possible,
even after very long & tough configuring. Documentation says also: 

"Apache > HTTP Server > Documentation > Version 2.0 > How-To "

And version should be 2.2. Propably configuration scheme has ALSO changed??
Fix, please.

Since many many people have cgi working fine, you obviously have a configuration
problem and not a bug.  The correct place to deal with configuration problems is:
http://httpd.apache.org/userslist.html

(As far as the documentation issue, you obviously stumbled on the wrong version
of the docs.  See:
http://httpd.apache.org/docs/2.2/howto/cgi.html
for 2.2)
creator: slive@apache.org
